patterns_discovered: Multiple test cases covering edge cases
Nested validation for messages and participants
Granular error reporting with field and message details
gotchas_discovered: Requires explicit validation for nested objects
Time-based validations are complex (created_at vs updated_at)
Need to handle nil messages in slice
Different validation rules for tool vs non-tool messages
recommendations: Consider extracting validation logic into separate methods for better modularity
Add more boundary tests for extreme time differences
Consider using a validation library for complex validation rules
Add performance benchmarks for validation methods
